attributes.action: Gemini Donnelly-Martin to be considered for the George medal for civilian gallantry
attributes.additional_details: This petition calls for the consideration of Gemini Donnelly-Martin to be awarded the George medal for civilian gallantry for her efforts on Wednesday in Woolwich. She confronted 2 armed terrorists to make sure that Lee Rigby did not diealone. She did this at age 20 with no thought to her own safety
